title: The effect of oxygen on NiO as a back buffer layer in CdTe solar cells

Thin film CdTe-based photovoltaic devices have achieved high efficiency above 22%. However, the device performance is limited by large open circuit voltage deficit. One of the primary reasons is non-ohmic...
